fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Digital Single Market and the Energy Union, especially Telecoms Code
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Danish Energy Association 
Confederation of Danish Industry 
Teleindustrien (http://www.teleindu.dk/om-ti/)
goals__remit:
SE is a modern energy and telecommunications group. Our services consist of electricity, energy efficiency, fiber broadband and TV to our over 650,000 customers. 
 
We are a cooperative owned by our more than 300.000 members. This means that SE's profits will not be getting a small group of shareholders but our customers, shareholders and above all the surrounding communities. That is why SE see a virtue in reinvesting our profits in good customer experiences, better products and in the society of which we are a part. 
  
SE is known to think in new ways. We invest in sustainable projects that we believe in and our ambition is to be the one who creates the most added-value in the Danish energy and telecommunications sectors. We are working hard to help make Denmark a sustainable knowledge society.
